If you don't know what to do with numbered folders, here's a simple guide to follow: 
1. Install WinRar
2. Right click on any one of the numbered folders and click "extract here"
3. WinRar will now extract the .ISO to that folder
4. Burn Iso onto a DVD using Nero Burning Rom
